amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for enforcement of Section 526 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 which prevents Federal agencies from entering into contracts for the procurement of a fuel unless its lifecyle greenhouse gas emissions are less than or equal to emissions from an equivalent conventional fuel produced from conventional petroleum sources.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prhoibit the use of funds to enforce section 526 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Flores.
